title: How popular is BlackBerry platform? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually, it is not so popular in mobile app development, as iOS or Android. But users still think that the platform is good for chatting, calling and email messaging. Here is a great infographics that show the difference of the platform when choosing a mobile development one: To App Or Not To App: Choosing Mobile App Development Platform That Is Of Benefit To You.
You can segment it many ways. For BlackBerry, you can segment it among demographic where BB is hot in some demographics or via countries. If you are developing an app for Indonesia, then BB is a must
